So, Simon Baker is listed as a nominee in the "best sound design" category (row index 4). But the claim says he was nominated for "best set design," which is row index 1. 

Therefore, while Simon Baker did receive a nomination in 2008 for a Laurence Olivier Award, it wasn't for Best Set Design but rather for Best Sound Design. The correct nominee for Best Set Design was Rob Howell.
